name: Separated Dinos
description:
Available to play without download on Liluo.io via the link below:
https://games.gdevelop-app.com/game-c3802932-c097-4769-b2b4-fa49cf10c9d8/index.html

In Collaboration with @maliyah12344444

Two hungry dinos have been separated from each other! Complete all the obstacles along the way to find the two stars per level that will help them reunite!

Controls: Although separated, the dinos will both respond to the same control scheme! (Gamepad Supported). You'll have to keep an eye on both of them when moving them around.

One of the Dinos is faster than the other and can jump further as a result. The other can jump quite a bit higher.

Collect the lemons and blueberries for higher scores, avoid spikes or suffer reducing your score, and use the swappers to trade places.
